jobs.title: Sensing Tex - Full Stack Developer
jobs.description: Working at Sensing Tex, a pioneering company in smart textiles and stretchable electronics powered by AI and IoT. Developing cutting-edge web applications for health monitoring systems, barometric platforms, and IoT solutions. Building scalable cloud-based platforms that integrate hardware sensors with real-time data visualization. Implementing responsive frontends with React and Tailwind CSS, while managing backend services with Docker and Docker Compose. Working with networking protocols, WebSockets for real-time communication, and deploying applications on Linux-based virtual machines. Utilizing Git for version control and collaborating on innovative healthcare and wellness technology solutions that democratize flexible electronics.

jobs.title: Freelance IT Developer
jobs.description: Since April 2024, I've been working as a freelance IT developer, collaborating on web and software projects. I use technologies like JavaScript, MongoDB, Vite, React, C, Node.js, Tailwind CSS, and more to create scalable and efficient solutions. My focus is on developing modern applications, optimizing processes, and delivering exceptional user experiences. Additionally, I apply best development practices, such as automated testing with Cypress and Selenium, and manage code with Git, all in Linux environments to ensure the best performance and reliability.

jobs.title: Hotel Oasis. Barcelona
jobs.description: During my experience in reception, I have performed various tasks and over the years I have mastered many aspects of the profession. I particularly excel in managing bookings and customers, ensuring a smooth and efficient service. I also have advanced knowledge of two hotel management programs (PMS - Property Management System). I handle problem-solving, including check-in, check-out, invoicing, and providing assistance both by phone and in person to meet guests' needs at all times.
